sourcesContent:
Hello, Home!

Username: {{info.username}}
Roles: {{info.roles}}
Token: {{info.token}}

Please login. import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TokenStorageService } from '../auth/token-storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { info: any; constructor(private token: TokenStorageService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.info = { token: this.token.getToken(), username: this.token.getUsername(), authorities: this.token.getAuthorities() }; } logout() { this.token.signOut(); window.location.reload(); } }
